headline: S&P 500 Oilfield Service Giant SLB Beats Earnings, Raises Dividend With Headwinds 'Behind' It
summary: S&P 500 oilfield service giant SLB reported early Friday better-than-expected fourth-quarter earnings and revenue while also increasing its quarterly dividend and telling investors business headwinds are in the rearview mirror.  For 2026, SLB forecasts capital investment to be approximately $2.5 billion, about even with $2.4 billion in capital expenditures during 2025.  SLB plans to return more than $4 billion to shareholders in 2026 through dividends and share repurchases.

raw.headline: S&P 500 Oilfield Service Giant SLB Beats Earnings, Raises Dividend With Headwinds 'Behind' It
raw.summary: S&P 500 oilfield service giant SLB reported early Friday better-than-expected fourth-quarter earnings and revenue while also increasing its quarterly dividend and telling investors business headwinds are in the rearview mirror.  For 2026, SLB forecasts capital investment to be approximately $2.5 billion, about even with $2.4 billion in capital expenditures during 2025.  SLB plans to return more than $4 billion to shareholders in 2026 through dividends and share repurchases.

headline: SLB: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The average estimate of 10 analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of 74 cents per share. The world's largest oilfield services company posted revenue of $9.74 billion in the period, also topping Street forecasts. Seven analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $9.53 billion.

headline: WEF wraps up, consumer data, YF housing special: What to Watch
summary: Market Domination Overtime host Josh Lipton takes a look at the top stories for investors to watch on Friday, Jan. 23, including the last day of the World Economic Forum (WEF) in Davos, Switzerland; earnings results from SLB Limited (SLB), Ericsson (ERIC), and Booz Allen Hamilton (BAH); the latest consumer sentiment reading; and Yahoo Finance's housing special. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime.
